alert.note: Alert for Rogers; Tulsa; Wagoner (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 04 at 8:12AM CDT until May 04 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Rogers County in northeastern Oklahoma... Northwestern Wagoner County in northeastern Oklahoma... Southeastern Tulsa County in northeastern Oklahoma... * Until 900 AM CDT. * At 812 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Jenks Riverside Airport, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations in or near the path include... Tulsa... Broken Arrow... Claremore... Owasso... Bixby... Jenks... Glenpool... Catoosa... Verdigris... Inola... Jenks Riverside Airport... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 219 and 246. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
